appliesToEverything.description: Text displayed for styles that apply to all sites

enableStyleLabel.description: Label for the button to enable a style

appliesDomainOption.description: Option to make the style apply to the entered string as a domain

styleMozillaFormatExport.description: Heading for the section with buttons to import/export Mozilla format of the style

updateAllCheckSucceededNoUpdate.message: All styles are up to date.

styleFromMozillaFormatPrompt.description: Prompt in the dialog displayed after clicking 'Import from Mozilla format' button

search.description: Label before the search input field in the editor shown on Ctrl-F

styleBeautify.description: Label for the CSS-beautifier button on the edit style page

styleEnabledLabel.description: Label for the enabled state of styles

sectionAdd.description: Label for the button to add a section

writeStyleForURL.description: Text for link in toolbar pop-up to write a new style for the current URL

appliesAdd.description: Label for the button to add an 'applies' entry

appliesRegexpOption.description: Option to make the style apply to the entered string as a regular expression

searchStyles.description: Label for the search filter textbox on the Manage styles page

disableStyleLabel.description: Label for the button to disable a style

menuShowBadge.description: Label (must be very short) for the checkbox in the toolbar button context menu controlling toolbar badge text.

cm_lineWrapping.description: Label for the checkbox controlling word wrap option for the style editor.

styleCancelEditLabel.description: Label for cancel button for style editing

styleChangesNotSaved.message: You've made changes to this style without saving.
styleChangesNotSaved.description: Text for the prompt when changes are made to a style and the user tries to leave without saving

importLabel.description: Label for the button to import a style ('edit' page) or all styles ('manage' page)

deleteStyleConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this style?

styleBadRegexp.description: Validation message for a bad regexp in a style

optionsHeading.description: Heading for options section on manage page.

styleUpdate.message: Are you sure you want to update '$stylename$'?

editStyleTitle.description: Title of the page for editing styles

updateCheckSucceededNoUpdate.description: Text that displays when an update check completed and no update is available

appliesUrlPrefixOption.description: Option to make the style apply to the entered string as a URL prefix

searchRegexp.description: Label after the search input field in the editor shown on Ctrl-F

importReplaceTooltip.message: Discard contents of current style and overwrite it with the imported style

popupHaveNoStyle.message: You donâ€™t have any styles installed for this site.

noStylesForSite.message: You don't have any styles installed for this web page

appliesRemove.description: Label for the button to remove an 'applies' entry

writeStyleFor.description: Label for toolbar pop-up that precedes the links to write a new style

replace.description: Label before the replace input field in the editor shown on Ctrl-H

appliesLabel.description: Label for 'applies to' fields on the edit/add screen

openManage.description: Link to open the manage page.

appliesSpecify.description: Label for the button to make a style apply only to specific sites

installUpdate.description: Label for the button to install an update for a single style

sectionRemove.description: Label for the button to remove a section

disableAllStyles.description: Label for the checkbox that turns all enabled styles off.

updateCompleted.description: Text that displays when an update completed

updateAllStyles.description: Label for the button to check all styles for updates

sectionCode.description: Label for the code for a section

cm_smartIndent.description: Label for the checkbox controlling smart indentation option for the style editor.

exportHelp.message:
URL: Homepage address. And used to distinguish between different styles (Please ensure that different styles has different URL)
Update URL: Update the address. The content is the export file
MD5 URL: Check if there is an update. The content is the Original MD5 of latest version
Original MD5: The MD5 generated by system for identifying the latest version

appliesHelp.message: Use the 'Applies to' controls to limit what URLs the code in this section applies to.

styleMozillaFormatImport.description: Heading for the section with buttons to import/export Mozilla format of the style

editStyleHeading.description: Title of the page for editing styles

appliesUrlOption.description: Option to make the style apply to the entered string as a URL

addStyleTitle.description: Title of the page for adding styles

importReplaceLabel.description: Label for the button to import and overwrite current style

dbError.message: An error has occurred using the xStyle database. Would you like to visit a web page with possible solutions?
dbError.description: Prompt when a DB error is encountered

openCreate.description: Link to open the creation page.

importAppendTooltip.message: Append the imported style to current style
importAppendTooltip.description: Tooltip for the button to import a style and append to the existing sections

helpKeyMapHotkey.description: Placeholder text of inputbox in keymap help popup on the edit style page. Must be very short

cloudDeleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete "$filename$"?

replaceAll.description: Label before the replace input field in the editor shown on 'replaceAll' hotkey

editGotoLine.description: Go to line or line:column on Ctrl-G in style code editor

replaceWith.description: Label before the replace-with input field in the editor shown on Ctrl-H etc.

editStyleLabel.description: Label for the button to go to the edit style page

cm_theme.description: Label for the style editor's CSS theme.

helpKeyMapCommand.description: Placeholder text of inputbox in keymap help popup on the edit style page. Must be very short

updateOneStyle.description: Label for the button to check a single style for an update

description.message: Restyle the web with xStyle, a user styles manager. With xStyle you can install themes & skins for many sites and create your own.
